Reviews.Title: I have this phone.
Reviews.Author: Lynn
Reviews.Content: We bought 4 of these phones 9 days ago for $149.00 each.  Ours is for Straight Talk prepaid phone cards.  First Straight Talk's customer service is terrible.  Secondly, out of 4 phones, mine is messed up.  To make or receive a call, there is NO sound through the ear piece, however, I can hear over the speaker.  Also, I had failed texts tonight.  Don't know if that ties in or whether that's a reception issue.  Otherwise, I like the phone, and this is my first smart phone experience.  Will exchange tomorrow, and hope it goes better.

ProductInfo.Name: NET10 - ZTE Savy Savvy Mobile Phone Black (No-Contract)
